thread.title: Record whisky fetches $1.2 mln in Dubai

title: Record whisky fetches $1.2 mln in Dubai
text:
Record whisky fetches $1.2 mln in Dubai 7:15am EDT - 01:54
The world's most expensive bottles of whisky have been sold in Dubai. The two limited editions of Macallan Scotch were bought for $600,000 each, thought to be the most paid by a private buyer. Nawied Jabarkhyl reports ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
The world's most expensive bottles of whisky have been sold in Dubai. The two limited editions of Macallan Scotch were bought for $600,000 each, thought to be the most paid by a private buyer.
